TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CommonDialog extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class CommonDialog Inherits Component
public ref class CommonDialog abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

Docs.summary: Specifies the base class used for displaying dialog boxes on the screen.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 继承的类实现所需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.RunDialog%2A>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>创建特定的通用对话框。 可以选择重写继承的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A>实现特定的对话框挂钩功能。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog>实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>并演示如何创建和显示一个对话框。 此示例需要具有的现有窗体中的方法调用从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>在其上放置。
[!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HelpRequest As EventHandler

Docs.summary: Occurs when the user clicks the Help button on a common dialog box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 有关处理事件的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog>对象设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog.AnyColor%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog.AllowFullOpen%2A>属性。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog>对象不允许用户可以设置自定义颜色，但它允许完整的一组基本颜色显示。 通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog.SolidColorOnly%2A>属性设置为 false，它允许组合中的其他系统上使用 256 或更少的颜色的颜色的颜色的显示。 该示例还演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog.ShowHelp%2A>属性和处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HelpRequest>对话框中的事件。 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体和调用`InitializeColorDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。 此示例需要`Click`该按钮的事件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual IntPtr HookProc (IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance native int HookProc(native int hWnd, int32 msg, native int wparam, native int lparam) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function HookProc (hWnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wparam As IntPtr, lparam As IntPtr) As IntPtr
protected: virtual IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
abstract member HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint override this.HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint

Docs.param: The handle to the dialog box window.
Docs.summary: Defines the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.
Docs.returns: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 挂钩过程是依据函数可以截获事件之前到达应用程序的机制。 当你重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>类，操作系统将调用要将操作系统消息发送到窗口的函数的重写。
默认情况下，挂钩过程中心 WM_INITDIALOG 消息响应中的屏幕上的对话框。
> [!NOTE] > 此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType>，防止它调用不受信任代码; 只能直接调用方需要具有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>权限。 如果可以从部分受信任代码调用你的代码，将用户输入不传递<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>类而不进行验证的方法。 有关在将使用的重要限制`LinkDemand`成员，请参阅[Demand vs。LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。
此属性还使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全特性; 若要重写此成员，派生的类必须具有`CustomPermission`权限。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A>方法。 此示例由继承的类组成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>类。 在类的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A>重写时，该示例的计算结果的方法`msg`参数与常量值的特定 Windows 消息。 如果`msg`参数等于指定的常数，该示例将标识传递到的 Windows 消息的跟踪输出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A>方法。 此示例假定在其中类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A>方法声明继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>类。
[!code-cpp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CPP/fontdialogoverride.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CS/fontdialogoverride.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/VB/fontdialogoverride.vb#1)]

Docs.permission: 直接调用方调用非托管的代码。 关联的枚举：

block.para: 继承类可以重写此方法以向通用对话框添加特定功能。在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。

Docs.param: An that provides the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击帮助按钮时，会调用此方法。 继承类可以重写此方法以处理该事件。

Docs.param: The window handle of the message to send.
The wparam to send with the message.
The lparam to send with the message.
Docs.summary: Defines the owner window procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.
Docs.returns: The result of the message processing, which is dependent on the message sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向通用对话框所有者窗口发送消息时，控件将传输到此处。 继承类可以重写此方法以向通用对话框添加特定功能。

Docs.permission: 直接调用方调用非托管的代码。 关联的枚举：

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, resets the properties of a common dialog box to their default values.
Docs.permission: 对于非托管代码调用此方法。 关联的枚举：

block.para: 继承类可以重写此方法来重置其属性。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool RunDialog(native int hwndOwner) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function RunDialog (hwndOwner As IntPtr) As Boolean

Docs.param: A value that represents the window handle of the owner window for the common dialog box.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, specifies a common dialog box.
Docs.returns: if the dialog box was successfully run; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用对话框的用户调用时，会调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>，并且它必须由继承的类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>实现特定的通用对话框。

Docs.permission: 对于非托管代码调用此方法。 关联的枚举：

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowDialog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Runs a common dialog box with a default owner.
Docs.returns: if the user clicks OK in the dialog box; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法实现 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.RunDialog%2A>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog>实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>并演示如何创建和显示一个对话框。 此示例需要具有的现有窗体中的方法调用从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>在其上放置。
[!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Docs.permission: 从打印。 关联的枚举：
用于安全子窗口调用此方法。 关联的枚举：

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowDialog(class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner) cil managed
Public Function ShowDialog (owner As IWin32Window) As DialogResult

Docs.param: Any object that implements that represents the top-level window that will own the modal dialog box.
Docs.summary: Runs a common dialog box with the specified owner.
Docs.returns: if the user clicks **OK** in the dialog box; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>方法允许你指定特定的窗体或将拥有显示的对话框中的控件。 如果你使用此方法没有参数的版本，显示的对话框将由你的应用程序的当前活动窗口自动拥有。

Docs.permission: 从打印。 关联的枚举：
用于安全子窗口调用此方法。 关联的枚举：

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来存储有关控件的任意信息。
